title: Impeachment, Professor Alan Dershowitz
itunes:title: Impeachment, Professor Alan Dershowitz
description:
Guest host June Grasso discusses President Trump’s impeachment trial with guests Anna Edgerton, Bloomberg Politics Editor, John C. Bonifaz,

President of Free Speech For People, and Alan Dershowitz, Defense Attorney, longtime professor of Law at Harvard, and author of dozens of books including The Case Against Impeaching Trump.


June also spoke with Greg Stohr, Bloomberg Supreme Court reporter about recent news from the court.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
